refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns a list of available library commands along with a one-line usage message for each. If a command is supplied as an argument, the one-line usage message for that command is returned.

refsection.para: Returns a list of available library commands along with a one-line usage message for each. If a command is supplied as an argument, the one-line usage message for that command is returned. The help, helpdevel, ?, ?devel, and ?lib commands provide additional information on available commands.
The example shows the use of the helplib command to display a one-line usage message for a specific library command.

info.title: Display a one-line usage message for a specific library command.

listitem.para: Displays a one-line usage message for the mat_trn command.

refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
